Title: Distractions
Plot: While a severely burned teenager is admitted and his blood tests come back with strange results, House makes himself the guinea pig in his own unofficial tests of a new drug designed to treat migraines to prove a former medical school colleague is wrong about the drug.
GuestStars: Judy Louise Johnson, Michael Merton, Kristen Pate, Dorothea Harahan, Dan Butler, James Immekus, Lisa Darr, Christopher Cousins
